MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut in the EH44 postcode area of Innerleithen. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut however our engineers are on site and in order to complete a permanent repair, we now need to carry out a further emergency shutdown. This may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by midnight. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:10pm on Monday, 11th January 2021.
